participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I once went to the Maldives and felt like a princess in a tropical paradise. I love to fish. I'm a kindergarten teacher. I don't have a car, but I do have a great reading nook in my house. I have been reminiscing about my childhood while watching my kids play in the creek.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.background: I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking. My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank. I love to eat meat. I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie. I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

content.text: Hey I heard you are a filmmaker, do you like it?
I love being a filmmaker, but I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream.
Oh, that's rough. Do you have any friends that are also filmmakers?
A few, but not many. It's a pretty competitive industry.
I bet. Do you want to get together and talk about filmmaking sometime? I'm a kindergarten teacher, so I don't know much about it, but I'm always curious about new things.
Sure, that would be fun! I'm always looking for new people to talk to about film.
Great! I'm free this weekend if you are.
I am! Let's meet up at the coffee shop on Main Street at 10am?
Sounds good to me! I'll see you then.
